First Schedule.title: The States and the Union territories
First Schedule.description: Lists all States and Union Territories of India along with their territorial extent.

Second Schedule.title: Emoluments, allowances, privileges and so on
Second Schedule.description: Contains provisions relating to salaries, allowances, and privileges of constitutional authorities such as the President, Governors, Judges, etc.

Third Schedule.title: Forms of Oaths or Affirmations
Third Schedule.description: Specifies the oaths and affirmations for public offices including ministers, judges, and legislators.

Fourth Schedule.title: Allocation of seats in the Council of States
Fourth Schedule.description: Details the allocation of seats to States and Union Territories in the Rajya Sabha.

Fifth Schedule.title: Administration and control of Scheduled Areas and Scheduled Tribes
Fifth Schedule.description: Deals with the administration of Scheduled Areas and protection of Scheduled Tribes.

Sixth Schedule.title: Administration of tribal areas in Assam, Meghalaya, Tripura and Mizoram
Sixth Schedule.description: Provides special administrative provisions for tribal areas in certain northeastern states.

Seventh Schedule.title: Union List, State List and Concurrent List
Seventh Schedule.description: Defines the distribution of legislative powers between the Union and the States.

Eighth Schedule.title: Languages
Eighth Schedule.description: Lists the officially recognized languages of India.

Ninth Schedule.title: Validation of certain Acts and Regulations
Ninth Schedule.description: Contains laws protected from judicial review on the grounds of violation of fundamental rights.

Tenth Schedule.title: Anti-defection provisions
Tenth Schedule.description: Provides provisions relating to disqualification of legislators on the ground of defection.

Eleventh Schedule.title: Powers, authority and responsibilities of Panchayats
Eleventh Schedule.description: Lists matters related to rural local governance under Panchayati Raj institutions.

Twelfth Schedule.title: Powers, authority and responsibilities of Municipalities
Twelfth Schedule.description: Lists matters related to urban local governance under Municipal bodies.
